summary: The module defines comprehensive test suites for the Stable Diffusion image‑to‑image generation pipeline, covering fast deterministic checks with lightweight components, extensive nightly validation across various sampling schedulers, and slower, more exhaustive robustness tests under different configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and stability of the Stable Diffusion img2img pipeline in production and CI environments, enabling reliable image generation features for downstream applications.
